projectGroups.name: trivago
projectGroups.description: They have managed to secure massive clients due to their dedication to what they call ‘Data Intelligence’ - using data effectively to glean valuable and actionable insights on a large scale. They are working on a web platform which covers the entire data pipeline, from collection to visualization. I was largely tasked with producing realistic product mockups for said platform for the corporate website, but also had a chance to work on their ‘Visualize’ product
